Promotional video I made for an assignment

Posted on 22 October 2011

Just last night, I finished an assignment using Adobe After Effects where we had to create almost any sort of video, as long as we used AE. This was my submission. It is basically a promotional video to advertise my skills. Most of the graphic design work (apart from Brainchild) has been for assignments. Do note that I don't actually do animation, so the bit at the start was just to fill in time (it had to go from 1 to 2 minutes long).

Let me know what you think!
